column2: We have shown the false kingdoms who the true Emperor of Japan is. Now we have the divine authority to unite the disparate peoples under a single banner!
The false emperors are drawing too much profit from the trading center in Settsu. Controlling it will help fund our mighty nation.
Our cultural kin to the north are being oppressed by barbarians. We must save them from their oppression.
Our cultural kin in Okinawa are being oppressed by heathens. We must bring them into the fold.
The western island is an ideal port for raiding missions against the Chinese. Securing it would bring our nation great prosperity while denying it to others.
We must explore all possible avenues of expansion. The islands to the north may be useful to us.
Our religious views put us in a disadvantaged position on the Japanese islands. We must seek out friendships to aid us.
Our religious views put us in a disadvantaged position on the Japanese islands. We must seek out friendships to aid us.
A warrior philosophy of bravery, loyalty and honor.
Codify the virtues of honor and bravery in our warrior class and create a formidable fighting force.
Pirates from the east are crippling our trade. We must either form a blockade or conquer their home ports to end these raids.
Horsemen are raiding the outer reaches of our empire. We must either finish reparations of the Great Wall or eliminate the source of this nuisance.
We hold the ground of the Bodhi-tree. Buddhist pilgrims come from far and wide to see where the Buddha attained enlightenment.
Our nation watches over the Temple of Confucius
We have established our cultural and military dominance over the Indus valley. The Hindusthani people now look to us for protection and guidance. We should welcome them all into our mighty empire.

We have survived countless incursions by Mongols and Persians, as well as instability from within. The riches of India must be secured under our watchful eye as foreign invaders will never rest until they have taken what is rightfully ours.

The Dravidian people have been divided for too long. Petty infighting has weakened us all and made appear weak to foreign interests. The time is right to unite the southern peninsula into a cohesive state and establish a mighty presence in the world.

The Dravidian people have been divided for too long. Petty infighting has weakened us all and made appear weak to foreign interests. The time is right to unite the southern peninsula into a cohesive state and establish a mighty presence in the world.
The people of $PROVINCENAME$ are content with our rule. They can't see themselves as citizens of any nation but our own.
It is a great source of shame for our people that we do not control the province of Settsu. Our nation has the divine right to control the trade center there and the flow of goods around the island.

People are becoming restless in our nation, as they see their brothers oppressed in nearby lands. It is the divine right of our nation to be the sole ruler over all of Japan. Our subjects are now asking why we are not pursuing this goal.

The Meenakshi Amman in Madurai is in a state of disrepair. Dating back to time immemorial when Shiva descended to Earth, the grounds were looted and defiled by Muslim invaders. Reconstruction of the temple will transform the province of Madurai into a holy site.
We watch over the holy site where Shiva descended to Earth
As our world view broadens, critiques against our ways of thinking are becoming more common. Perhaps we should establish a scholarly forum for this sort of discussion.
A gathering of our finest religious and philosophical thinkers.

The French East India Company is diverting large amounts of wealth away from Asia and into the coffers of European kings. If we can shut down the company by removing the French bases from East Asia we will deliver a serious economic blow to them as well as strengthen our own trade presence in the region.

The Dutch India Company is diverting large amounts of wealth away from Asia and into the coffers of European kings. If we can shut down the company by removing the Dutch bases from East Asia we will deliver a serious economic blow to them as well as strengthen our own trade presence in the region.

The Portuguese East India Company is diverting large amounts of wealth away from Asia and into the coffers of European kings. If we can shut down the company by removing the Portuguese bases from East Asia we will deliver a serious economic blow to them as well as strengthen our own trade presence in the region.

The British East India Company is diverting large amounts of wealth away from Asia and into the coffers of European kings. If we can shut down the company by removing the British bases from East Asia we will deliver a serious economic blow to them as well as strengthen our own trade presence in the region.

The Spanish East India Company is diverting large amounts of wealth away from Asia and into the coffers of European kings. If we can shut down the company by removing the Spanish bases from East Asia we will deliver a serious economic blow to them as well as strengthen our own trade presence in the region.

The Castillian East India Company is diverting large amounts of wealth away from Asia and into the coffers of European kings. If we can shut down the company by removing the Castillian bases from East Asia we will deliver a serious economic blow to them as well as strengthen our own trade presence in the region.
Competing factions are fighting for influence of our government and interfering with everyday affairs.
Competing factions are fighting for influence of our government and interfering with everyday affairs.
Competing factions are fighting for influence of our government and interfering with everyday affairs.
Our leader is deftly maneuvering the political battlefield in order to run our nation.
Various factions have always competed for the ear of the emperor. Lately one group has become increasingly powerful and is beginning to push their agenda for the rule of our glorious empire.
We will have to deal with this.
Our emperor has managed to placate the feuding factions of our government and has asserted more direct rule.
Our nations missionary work has made it necessary to expand our ranks of theologians and scholars. As a result, the influence of the Temple Faction has grown quite a bit.
A powerful statesmen in service to our nation has appointed several important bureaucrats to positions of power. They are beginning to exert a great deal of control over our Emperor's rule.
The Japanese people are enjoying peace and prosperity at last, perhaps the period of the warring states has come to an end.
Seeing as we hold Kyoto, it should surprise no-one that we claim the imperial throne. No longer a mere daimyo, let us proclaim Japan united once again!
